skills.name: KNOWLEDGE SEEKER
desc: • Deal 2 hits of Physical, Magic, and True damage to all enemies.
• 35% Chance to Remove All Beneficial Effects, including Golden Effects, from each enemy before dealing damage.

skills.name: CIDER OF IDUN
desc: • 50% Chance to Freeze each enemy for 1 turn.
• Gain a Random Offensive and Defensive Effect, including Golden effects, for 2 turns.

skills.name: THRONE OF YGGDRASIL
desc: • Deal 2 hits of Physical, Magic, and True damage to all enemies.
• Inflict Passive or Perfect Disable on each enemy for 2 turns.
• 35% Chance to inflict Stun or Perfect Stun on each enemy for 1 turn.
